message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I've set the price at $1,350,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position on the price.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,200,000 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $1,275,000? This reflects the true value of what I'm offering.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in between our current offers.
